title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Bedroom", ca. 1934–35
medium: Graphite on and black ink on tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions and instructions; black ink stain in lower left corner
description: Plan for bedroom on Lady Esther Yacht. Entrance on left wall at center; wrap-around cabinets and drawers on left and lower wall. Chaise lounge in lower right corner facing entrance. Vanity with curved left side on wall at right with circular vanity bench. Double-bed on upper left wall, flanked by night table at each side. Large, walk-in wardrobe in upper right corner of room with clothing racks and shoe racks. Large bathroom at right with tub/shower, sink, toilet, electrical bath (?) and electric vibra't (?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Bedroom", ca. 1934–35.
ca. 1934–35. Graphite on and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-447.
